trans-unit.resname: KHC·1 | Lathril, Blade of the Elves | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lathril, Blade of the Elves
trans-unit.target: 妖精之刃拉席莉

trans-unit.resname: KHC·1 | Lathril, Blade of the Elves | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.\n{T}, Tap ten untapped Elves you control: Each opponent loses 10 life and you gain 10 life.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出等量的1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。 {T}，横置十个由你操控且未横置的妖精：每位对手各失去10点生命，且你获得10点生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·2 | Ranar the Ever-Watchful | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ranar the Ever-Watchful
trans-unit.target: 永恒守护拉纳尔

trans-unit.resname: KHC·2 | Ranar the Ever-Watchful | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance\nThe first card you foretell each turn costs {0} to foretell.\nWhenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 你每回合预示的第一张牌支付{0}来预示。 每当你从你手上放逐牌和／或从战场上放逐永久物且数量达一或更多时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·3 | Cosmic Intervention | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cosmic Intervention
trans-unit.target: 寰宇干预

trans-unit.resname: KHC·3 | Cosmic Intervention | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If a permanent you control would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn, exile it instead. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.\nForetell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，如果某个由你操控的永久物将从战场进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 预示{1}{W}（在你的回合中，你可以支付{2}并从你手上牌面朝下地放逐此牌。过了该回合后，便可利用其预示费用来施放之。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·4 | Hero of Bretagard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hero of Bretagard
trans-unit.target: 碧塔嘉勇士

trans-unit.resname: KHC·4 | Hero of Bretagard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, put that many +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.\nAs long as CARDNAME has five or more counters on it, it has flying and is an Angel in addition to its other types.\nAs long as CARDNAME has ten or more counters on it, it has indestructible and is a God in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手上放逐牌和／或从战场上放逐永久物且数量达一或更多时，在CARDNAME上放置等量的+1/+1指示物。 只要CARDNAME上有五个或更多指示物，它便具有飞行异能，且额外具有天使此类别。 只要CARDNAME上有十个或更多指示物，它便具有不灭异能，且额外具有神此类别。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·5 | Stoic Farmer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stoic Farmer
trans-unit.target: 寡欲农夫

trans-unit.resname: KHC·5 | Stoic Farmer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Plains card and reveal it. If an opponent controls more lands than you, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.\nForetell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的平原牌并展示该牌。若某对手操控的地比你多，则将该牌横置放进战场。若否，则将它置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。 预示{1}{W}（在你的回合中，你可以支付{2}并从你手上牌面朝下地放逐此牌。过了该回合后，便可利用其预示费用来施放之。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·6 | Sage of the Beyond | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sage of the Beyond
trans-unit.target: 彼方智者

trans-unit.resname: KHC·6 | Sage of the Beyond | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nSpells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.\nForetell {4}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你从你手牌以外的任何区域施放之咒语减少{2}来施放。 预示{4}{U}（在你的回合中，你可以支付{2}并从你手上牌面朝下地放逐此牌。过了该回合后，便可利用其预示费用来施放之。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·7 | Spectral Deluge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spectral Deluge
trans-unit.target: 幽灵漫天

trans-unit.resname: KHC·7 | Spectral Deluge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.\nForetell {1}{U}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
trans-unit.target: 将由对手操控且防御力等于或小于X的所有生物移回其拥有者手上，X为由你操控的海岛数量。 预示{1}{U}{U}（在你的回合中，你可以支付{2}并从你手上牌面朝下地放逐此牌。过了该回合后，便可利用其预示费用来施放之。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·8 | Tales of the Ancestors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tales of the Ancestors
trans-unit.target: 先祖传说

trans-unit.resname: KHC·8 | Tales of the Ancestors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each player with fewer cards in hand than the player with the most cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference.\nForetell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
trans-unit.target: 每位手牌不是最多的牌手各抓若干牌，其数量等同于他与手牌最多的牌手之间手牌数量的差距。 预示{1}{U}（在你的回合中，你可以支付{2}并从你手上牌面朝下地放逐此牌。过了该回合后，便可利用其预示费用来施放之。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·9 | Pact of the Serpent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pact of the Serpent
trans-unit.target: 盘蛇盟约

trans-unit.resname: KHC·9 | Pact of the Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of creatures they control of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。目标牌手抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为由其操控的该类别生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·9 | Pact of the Serpent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Our quarrels behind us. Our foes before us. Death or triumph for us all!"
trans-unit.target: 「纷争先放脑后，敌人就在眼前。成功成仁在此一搏！」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·10 | Ruthless Winnower | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ruthless Winnower
trans-unit.target: 绝情筛除者

trans-unit.resname: KHC·10 | Ruthless Winnower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Elf creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手牺牲一个非妖精生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·10 | Ruthless Winnower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I count the usurpers with my dagger, one death blow at a time."
trans-unit.target: 「我用手中匕首来点算逆贼人头，一刀下去算一个。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·11 | Serpent's Soul-Jar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Serpent's Soul-Jar
trans-unit.target: 盘蛇魂瓶

trans-unit.resname: KHC·11 | Serpent's Soul-Jar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Elf you control dies, exile it.\n{T}, Pay 2 life: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的妖精死去时，将它放逐。 {T}，支付2 点生命：直到回合结束，你可以从以CARDNAME放逐的牌中施放一个生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·11 | Serpent's Soul-Jar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The coils spiral like time itself, carrying spirits back around from death to reawakening.
trans-unit.target: 蛇形环绕就如同时间轮回本身，带领灵魂由死亡回到苏生。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·12 | Bounty of Skemfar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bounty of Skemfar
trans-unit.target: 斯肯法恩泽

trans-unit.resname: KHC·12 | Bounty of Skemfar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and an Elf card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以将其中的一张地牌横置放进战场，并将其中的一张妖精牌置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·12 | Bounty of Skemfar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even war cannot dull Skemfar's beauty.
trans-unit.target: 连绵战火也抹不去斯肯法的美丽。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·13 | Crown of Skemfar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crown of Skemfar
trans-unit.target: 斯肯法之冠

trans-unit.resname: KHC·13 | Crown of Skemfar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Elf you control and has reach.\n{2}{G}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物具有延势异能，且你每操控一个妖精，它便得+1/+1。 {2}{G}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·13 | Crown of Skemfar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lathril, queen of the ancient Einir, left a powerful legacy for her mortal descendants.
trans-unit.target: 妖精古神女王拉席莉留下一件强大遗宝，由其凡人后裔世代传承。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·14 | Wolverine Riders | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wolverine Riders
trans-unit.target: 狼獾骑兵

trans-unit.resname: KHC·14 | Wolverine Riders | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.\nWhenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。 每当另一个妖精在你的操控下进战场时，你获得等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·14 | Wolverine Riders | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We'll break their lines. The rest of you, follow!"
trans-unit.target: 「我们会冲破他们防线。你们剩下的赶紧跟上！」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·15 | Elderfang Venom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elderfang Venom
trans-unit.target: 寰宇蛇毒液

trans-unit.resname: KHC·15 | Elderfang Venom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Attacking Elves you control have deathtouch.\nWhenever an Elf you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且进行攻击的妖精具有死触异能。 每当一个由你操控的妖精死去时，每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·15 | Elderfang Venom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Cosmos Serpent favored us with his venom. As thanks, we sink fangs into those who dishonor the old ways."
trans-unit.target: 「寰宇盘蛇将其毒液恩赐于吾人，于是我们便将利齿刺入亵渎古法者，以资回报。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·16 | Ethereal Valkyrie | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ethereal Valkyrie
trans-unit.target: 虚相女武神

trans-unit.resname: KHC·16 | Ethereal Valkyrie | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. It becomes foretold. Its foretell cost is its mana cost reduced by {2}. (On a later turn, you may cast it for its foretell cost, even if this creature has left the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌，然后从你手上牌面朝下地放逐一张牌。它成为已预示。其预示费用为其法术力费用减{2}。（过了该回合后，你便可利用其预示费用来施放之，就算此生物已离开战场也是一样。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·17 | Angel of Finality | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Finality
trans-unit.target: 终绝天使

trans-unit.resname: KHC·17 | Angel of Finality | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标牌手坟墓场中的所有牌。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·17 | Angel of Finality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Better the dead depart utterly than be enslaved."
trans-unit.target: 「逝者就该离苦得乐，免遭奴役。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·18 | Angel of Serenity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Serenity
trans-unit.target: 清朗天使

trans-unit.resname: KHC·18 | Angel of Serenity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择若干其他目标战场上的生物和／或坟墓场中的生物牌，上述数量至多为三。你可以将它们从所在区域放逐。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所放逐的牌移回各自拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·19 | Banishing Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Banishing Light
trans-unit.target: 驱逐明光

trans-unit.resname: KHC·19 | Banishing Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·19 | Banishing Light | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand.\n—*The Theriad*
trans-unit.target: 天尊伸手想要去拿石块，赫利欧德则将整个太阳递到她掌心。 ～*《塞洛亚特》*

trans-unit.resname: KHC·20 | Cleansing Nova | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cleansing Nova
trans-unit.target: 涤净散华

trans-unit.resname: KHC·20 | Cleansing Nova | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Destroy all creatures.\n• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •消灭所有生物。 •消灭所有神器和结界。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·20 | Cleansing Nova | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.
trans-unit.target: 在生命的最后时刻，恶魔仰望天空，眼中只见至纯光辉。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·21 | Cloudgoat Ranger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloudgoat Ranger
trans-unit.target: 云山羊巡林者

trans-unit.resname: KHC·21 | Cloudgoat Ranger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens.\nTap three untapped Kithkin you control: CARDNAME gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出三个1/1白色洁英／士兵衍生生物。 横置三个由你操控且未横置的洁英：直到回合结束，CARDNAME得+2/+0且获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·22 | Eerie Interlude | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eerie Interlude
trans-unit.target: 神秘插曲

trans-unit.resname: KHC·22 | Eerie Interlude | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 放逐任意数量目标由你操控的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所放逐之牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·22 | Eerie Interlude | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The barrier between existence and oblivion is thinner than you know.
trans-unit.target: 存在与虚无之间的界限，比你所知道的还要薄。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·23 | Evangel of Heliod | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evangel of Heliod
trans-unit.target: 赫利欧德的福音师

trans-unit.resname: KHC·23 | Evangel of Heliod | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出若干1/1白色士兵衍生生物，其数量等同于你的白色献力。（由你操控之永久物的法术力费用当中每含有一个{W}，你的白色献力就加一。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·24 | Flickerwisp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flickerwisp
trans-unit.target: 明灭翔灵

trans-unit.resname: KHC·24 | Flickerwisp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐另一个目标永久物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所放逐之牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·24 | Flickerwisp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its wings disturb more than air.
trans-unit.target: 其翅翼比所卷起的气流更扰乱人心。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·25 | Geist-Honored Monk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Geist-Honored Monk
trans-unit.target: 游魂护持僧

trans-unit.resname: KHC·25 | Geist-Honored Monk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·26 | Ghostly Prison | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghostly Prison
trans-unit.target: 魂魅拘禁

trans-unit.resname: KHC·26 | Ghostly Prison | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{2}，否则它不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·26 | Ghostly Prison | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though the spirits' bodies were ethereal, Agnur soon learned that their blades were quite solid—and razor-sharp.
trans-unit.target: 虽然鬼魂的身躯虚若无物，但阿格努很快就晓得它们手中的刀剑真实存在～且锋利无比。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·27 | Goldnight Commander | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goldnight Commander
trans-unit.target: 金夜指挥官

trans-unit.resname: KHC·27 | Goldnight Commander | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·27 | Goldnight Commander | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One faith, but many hands in victory."
trans-unit.target: 「万人一心，众志成城。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·28 | Kor Cartographer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kor Cartographer
trans-unit.target: 寇族制图师

trans-unit.resname: KHC·28 | Kor Cartographer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·28 | Kor Cartographer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 寇族没有探险的概念。他们是返回遗忘的家园。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·29 | Marshal's Anthem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marshal's Anthem
trans-unit.target: 元帅赞美诗

trans-unit.resname: KHC·29 | Marshal's Anthem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nCreatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times CARDNAME was kicked.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{1}{W}（你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}{W}。） 由你操控的生物得+1/+1。 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多X张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，X为CARDNAME增幅过的次数。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·30 | Momentary Blink | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Momentary Blink
trans-unit.target: 瞬时闪动

trans-unit.resname: KHC·30 | Momentary Blink | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.\nFlashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 返照{3}{U}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·31 | Restoration Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Restoration Angel
trans-unit.target: 复归天使

trans-unit.resname: KHC·31 | Restoration Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标由你操控的非天使生物，然后将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·32 | Return to Dust | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Return to Dust
trans-unit.target: 终归浮尘

trans-unit.resname: KHC·32 | Return to Dust | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标神器或结界。如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则你可以放逐至多另一个目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·32 | Return to Dust | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.
trans-unit.target: 有些时间流会不停歇地摩擦、分支、混杂。其他的则会突然结束。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·33 | Storm Herd | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Storm Herd
trans-unit.target: 风暴马群

trans-unit.resname: KHC·33 | Storm Herd | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个1/1白色，具飞行异能的飞马衍生生物，X为你的总生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·33 | Storm Herd | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd."\n—Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor
trans-unit.target: 「若在晴朗无云的日子听到雷鸣，快找掩蔽好躲开风暴马群。」 ～锡街篮贩丝寇托

trans-unit.resname: KHC·34 | Sun Titan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sun Titan
trans-unit.target: 旭日泰坦

trans-unit.resname: KHC·34 | Sun Titan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，你可以将目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·34 | Sun Titan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A blazing sun that never sets.
trans-unit.target: 永不落下的烈日。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·35 | Wall of Omens | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wall of Omens
trans-unit.target: 预兆墙

trans-unit.resname: KHC·35 | Wall of Omens | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 守军 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·35 | Wall of Omens | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."\n—Expedition journal entry
trans-unit.target: 「我寻求着没有奥札奇的赞迪卡愿景。」 ～探险队日志一笔

trans-unit.resname: KHC·36 | Arcane Artisan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arcane Artisan
trans-unit.target: 秘法工匠

trans-unit.resname: KHC·36 | Arcane Artisan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：目标牌手抓一张牌，然后从其手上放逐一张牌。如果以此法放逐的是生物牌，则该牌手派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品。 当CARDNAME离开战场，在下一个结束步骤开始时，放逐所有以它派出的衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·37 | Curse of the Swine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of the Swine
trans-unit.target: 野猪之咒

trans-unit.resname: KHC·37 | Curse of the Swine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.
trans-unit.target: 放逐X个目标生物。对每个以此法放逐的生物而言，其操控者派出一个2/2绿色野猪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·37 | Curse of the Swine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.
trans-unit.target: 另一场迫在眉睫的战役，在乱嗅和随意拱土之间消弭于无形。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·38 | Day of the Dragons | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Day of the Dragons
trans-unit.target: 诸龙时光

trans-unit.resname: KHC·38 | Day of the Dragons | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐所有由你操控的生物。然后派出等量的5/5红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，牺牲所有由你操控的龙。然后将所放逐之牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·39 | Ghostly Flicker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghostly Flicker
trans-unit.target: 鬼影闪烁

trans-unit.resname: KHC·39 | Ghostly Flicker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 放逐两个目标由你操控的神器，生物和／或地，然后将这些牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·39 | Ghostly Flicker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.
trans-unit.target: 有时暂且消失也不错。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·40 | Inspired Sphinx | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 获启史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: KHC·40 | Inspired Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓若干牌，其数量等同于你的对手数量。 {3}{U}：派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·41 | Mist Raven | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mist Raven
trans-unit.target: 雾鸦

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·41 | Mist Raven | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."\n—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia
trans-unit.target: 「若看到乌鸦，快逃往山丘。鬼潮一涌入，它马上就知道。」 ～涅非利亚渔夫思韦

trans-unit.target: 漂念精

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓两张牌。 呼魂{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·43 | Sea Gate Oracle | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 海户先知

trans-unit.resname: KHC·43 | Sea Gate Oracle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·43 | Sea Gate Oracle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The secret entrance should be near."
trans-unit.target: 「秘密入口应该就在附近。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·44 | Synthetic Destiny | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Synthetic Destiny
trans-unit.target: 构生命运

trans-unit.resname: KHC·44 | Synthetic Destiny | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.
trans-unit.target: 放逐所有由你操控的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出等量的生物牌为止，将所有以此法展示出的生物牌放进战场，然后将其余展示的牌洗入你的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·44 | Synthetic Destiny | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To Jin-Gitaxias, perfection is not a goal, but a process.
trans-unit.target: 对金吉塔厦而言，完化不是目标，而是过程。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·45 | Whirler Rogue | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Whirler Rogue
trans-unit.target: 旋翼浪客

trans-unit.resname: KHC·45 | Whirler Rogue | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.\nTap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·46 | Windfall | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Windfall
trans-unit.target: 横财

trans-unit.resname: KHC·46 | Windfall | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 每位牌手弃掉手牌，然后各抓若干牌，其数量等同于牌手中以此法弃牌的最多数量。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·46 | Windfall | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Rich" is a relative term.
trans-unit.target: 「富有」只是相对的。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·47 | Ambition's Cost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ambition's Cost
trans-unit.target: 野心的代价

trans-unit.resname: KHC·47 | Ambition's Cost | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你抓三张牌且失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·47 | Ambition's Cost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「到头来，还是第一个世界最难征服。随着我在世界之间穿行，我的力量愈发强大；无论向哪里下手，都会让下一次更为轻松。」 ～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: KHC·48 | Eyeblight Cullers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eyeblight Cullers
trans-unit.target: 碍眼绞杀客

trans-unit.resname: KHC·48 | Eyeblight Cullers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens, then mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出三个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物，然后磨三张牌。（将你牌库顶的三张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·48 | Eyeblight Cullers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As long as eyeblights exist, the hunt will never end."\n—Miara, Thorn of the Glade
trans-unit.target: 「只要世上仍有碍眼，猎杀就永不停止。」 ～林地棘刺米娅拉

trans-unit.resname: KHC·49 | Eyeblight Massacre | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eyeblight Massacre
trans-unit.target: 屠戮碍眼

trans-unit.resname: KHC·49 | Eyeblight Massacre | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 非妖精的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·49 | Eyeblight Massacre | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"\n—Nissa Revane, to Dwynen
trans-unit.target: 「我看过太多邪恶与黑暗，你为什么还要添加一笔？」 ～妮莎瑞文怒斥德维恩

trans-unit.resname: KHC·50 | Lys Alana Scarblade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lys Alana Scarblade
trans-unit.target: 黎撒拉那划疤客

trans-unit.resname: KHC·50 | Lys Alana Scarblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}，弃一张妖精牌：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的妖精数量。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·50 | Lys Alana Scarblade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.
trans-unit.target: 在为美着迷的黎撒拉那，其刀锋一划区分了上流盛宴与粪堆觅食。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·51 | Miara, Thorn of the Glade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
trans-unit.target: 林地棘刺米娅拉

trans-unit.resname: KHC·51 | Miara, Thorn of the Glade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的妖精死去时，你可以支付{1}和1点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: KHC·51 | Miara, Thorn of the Glade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Approach from downwind. Tread with care. Aim for the heart."
trans-unit.target: 「由下风处靠近，注意脚步，直取心脏。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·52 | Pride of the Perfect | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pride of the Perfect
trans-unit.target: 至美之傲

trans-unit.resname: KHC·52 | Pride of the Perfect | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Elves you control get +2/+0.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的妖精得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·52 | Pride of the Perfect | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like moonglove's flowers, the greatest beauty often masks the greatest dangers.
trans-unit.target: 正如月地黄的花朵，极致的美丽之下经常掩藏着极致的危险。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·53 | Prowess of the Fair | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prowess of the Fair
trans-unit.target: 英勇美技

trans-unit.resname: KHC·53 | Prowess of the Fair | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的妖精从战场进入你的坟墓场时，你可以派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·53 | Prowess of the Fair | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: An elvish duel is a thing of beauty: the warriors' grace, the crash of steel, then the artful spray of blood.
trans-unit.target: 妖精决斗是场绝景：优雅的战士，交碰的钢铁，然后是美丽飞散的血花。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·54 | Beast Whisperer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Beast Whisperer
trans-unit.target: 兽群语者

trans-unit.resname: KHC·54 | Beast Whisperer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·54 | Beast Whisperer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."
trans-unit.target: 「对我来说，再小的老鼠口中话语之声，都比整条锡街的喧闹狂欢来得响亮。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·55 | Cultivator of Blades | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cultivator of Blades
trans-unit.target: 育剑师

trans-unit.resname: KHC·55 | Cultivator of Blades | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: 装配2（当此生物进战场时，在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物或派出两个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以使其他进行攻击的生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·56 | Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
trans-unit.target: 金叶猎领德维恩

trans-unit.resname: KHC·56 | Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach\nOther Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.
trans-unit.target: 延势 由你操控的其他妖精生物得+1/+1。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你每操控一个进行攻击的妖精，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·56 | Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."
trans-unit.target: 「这是我们的土地。我们不允许碍眼荼毒它的美丽。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·57 | Elvish Archdruid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elvish Archdruid
trans-unit.target: 妖精高位德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: KHC·57 | Elvish Archdruid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.\n{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他妖精生物得+1/+1。 {T}：你每操控一个妖精，便加{G}。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·57 | Elvish Archdruid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The elves tend the forest, and the forest sustains the elves. My role is to ensure that the cycle continues."
trans-unit.target: 「妖精照管树林，树林滋养妖精。我负责确保这一循环永续。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·58 | Elvish Mystic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elvish Mystic
trans-unit.target: 妖精秘教徒

trans-unit.resname: KHC·58 | Elvish Mystic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.

trans-unit.resname: KHC·58 | Elvish Mystic | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「生命在各处成长。我的族人只是在寻找成长最旺的地方。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.resname: KHC·59 | Elvish Promenade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elvish Promenade
trans-unit.target: 妖精炫游

trans-unit.resname: KHC·59 | Elvish Promenade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个妖精，便派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·59 | Elvish Promenade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.
trans-unit.target: 纯良与无垢此二种姓构成妖精社会的底层，其上则是精英种姓。而最顶层称为至美，是贵族气派与掠夺欲求的完美结合。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·60 | Elvish Rejuvenator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elvish Rejuvenator
trans-unit.target: 回春妖精

trans-unit.resname: KHC·60 | Elvish Rejuvenator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以将其中的一张地牌横置放进战场。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·61 | End-Raze Forerunners | Card Name
trans-unit.source: End-Raze Forerunners

trans-unit.resname: KHC·61 | End-Raze Forerunners | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, trample, haste\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，践踏，敏捷 当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，由你操控的其他生物得+2/+2且获得警戒与践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·61 | End-Raze Forerunners | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Smash this city to pieces."\n—Domri Rade
trans-unit.target: 「将这城夷为平地。」 ～多密雷德

trans-unit.resname: KHC·62 | Farhaven Elf | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Farhaven Elf
trans-unit.target: 觅境妖精

trans-unit.resname: KHC·62 | Farhaven Elf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·62 | Farhaven Elf | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."
trans-unit.target: 「新绿之花确实存在。它只是在避难而已。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·63 | Harvest Season | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Harvest Season
trans-unit.target: 丰收季节

trans-unit.resname: KHC·63 | Harvest Season | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, and put those cards onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多X张基本地牌，X为由你操控且已横置的生物数量，并将这些牌横置放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·63 | Harvest Season | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A true reflection of nature: death fostering life.
trans-unit.target: 这正是自然的真实写照：死亡培育生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·64 | Imperious Perfect | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imperious Perfect
trans-unit.target: 骄傲至美

trans-unit.resname: KHC·64 | Imperious Perfect | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.\n{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他妖精生物得+1/+1。 {G}，{T}：派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·64 | Imperious Perfect | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.
trans-unit.target: 在美感的文化中，会将最美丽者崇敬如神。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·65 | Jagged-Scar Archers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jagged-Scar Archers
trans-unit.target: 锯疤箭手

trans-unit.resname: KHC·65 | Jagged-Scar Archers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.\n{T}: CARDNAME deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的妖精数量。 {T}：CARDNAME对目标具飞行异能的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·66 | Llanowar Tribe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Llanowar Tribe
trans-unit.target: 罗堰部族

trans-unit.resname: KHC·66 | Llanowar Tribe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

trans-unit.resname: KHC·66 | Llanowar Tribe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Llanowar remembers the Ice Age, the Phyrexian Invasion, and the Rift Era. So long as we draw breath, we will ensure such disasters never threaten our world again."
trans-unit.target: 「罗堰记得冰雪时代，记得非瑞克西亚大战役，也记得时缝年代。只要我们还有一口气，我们就要确保此类灾难再也不会威胁我们的世界。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·67 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lys Alana Huntmaster
trans-unit.target: 黎撒拉那领猎人

trans-unit.resname: KHC·67 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放妖精咒语时，你可以派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·67 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.
trans-unit.target: 从晓明殿最高的一层，直到蒙鸠地最暗的阴影，此号角的银色音符在空气中闪烁，让听闻者都为之牵动。

trans-unit.target: 培育人玛雯

trans-unit.resname: KHC·68 | Marwyn, the Nurturer | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个妖精在你的操控下进战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {T}：加若干{G}，其数量等同于玛雯的力量。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·68 | Marwyn, the Nurturer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Midwife to mothers and leader to all.
trans-unit.target: 母亲的助产士，万人的领导者。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·69 | Masked Admirers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."
trans-unit.target: 「美丽决定价值，而我们判定美丽。」

trans-unit.resname: KHC·70 | Nullmage Shepherd | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Skelle spent days carving runes and erecting their scorn poles. The herd crushed them to splinters in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 斯凯尔人花费好几天的时间在兽头棒上刻下诅咒文字，而后竖立起来以示挑衅。兽群眨眼之间便将它们砸个粉碎。

trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以支付{X}{X}。当你如此作时，将X个+1/+1指示物分配给任意数量的目标妖精。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.source: His blade carves a path for his people. His words guide them along it.
trans-unit.target: 他手中长刀为人民开辟道路。他口中话语引导人民依此前行。

trans-unit.target: 「无论是由石匠塑造，由铁匠锻造，或由法师赐予生命者，我都会让它们重归大地怀抱。」

trans-unit.source: Once a famed hunter and packmaster, now a renegade seeking his own path.

trans-unit.resname: KHC·80 | Wood Elves | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

trans-unit.target: 警戒；威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的妖精数量与你坟墓场中的妖精牌数量之总和。

trans-unit.source: "Run!" screamed its living mouths. "Come!" cried its dead ones.

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·91 | Putrefy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."\n—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer
trans-unit.target: 「不论是否复生之物，所有东西都会随时间推移而腐朽。我们只是让过程加速而已。」 ～葛加理腐尸农夫伊作

trans-unit.resname: KHC·92 | Shaman of the Pack | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手失去等同于由你操控之妖精数量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·92 | Shaman of the Pack | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To the elves, her spear is a compass; to the boggarts, a harbinger of doom.
trans-unit.target: 对妖精来说，她的长矛好似指南针；对波尬而言，则是死亡的先兆。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is exiled from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your end step, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 每当从战场放逐一个生物时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·93 | Soulherder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It watches over every absence.
trans-unit.target: 每一次消失皆由其照管。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·6 | Clarion Spirit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To the living, the horn sounds faint and mournful, but to the spirits of Istfell, it is a thunderous call that must be obeyed.
trans-unit.target: 在生者听来，这号声像是凄凉婉转的悲歌；但伊斯费幽魅所闻则是雷鸣贯耳的谕令。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·7 | Codespell Cleric | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Today we are not Beskir or Tuskeri. We must fight as one clan, shoulder to shoulder, to defend our rightful home!"
trans-unit.target: 「今天我们没有贝斯奇与塔科力之分。必须团结如一，并肩奋战，才能共同保卫我们的家园！」

trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。 只要你操控巨人，你便可以从你的坟墓场中施放CARDNAME，但须支付{U}，而非支付其法术力费用。如果你以此法施放CARDNAME，且它将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·114 | Valki, God of Lies | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When Valki enters the battlefield, each opponent reveals their hand. For each opponent, exile a creature card they revealed this way until Valki leaves the battlefield.\n{X}: Choose a creature card exiled with Valki with mana value X. Valki becomes a copy of that card.
trans-unit.target:
当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各展示其手牌。为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐一张其以此法展示的生物牌，直到瓦尔基离开战场为止。 {X}：选择一张以瓦尔基放逐且总法术力费用为X的生物牌。瓦尔基成为该牌的复制品。
提勃 {5}{B}{R}

trans-unit.resname: KHM·114 | Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor
trans-unit.target: 寰宇冒名客提勃

trans-unit.resname: KHM·114 | Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
As Tibalt enters the battlefield, you get an emblem with "You may play cards exiled with CARDNAME, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells."
[+2]: Exile the top card of each player's library.
[−3]: Exile target artifact or creature.
[−8]: Exile all graveyards. Add {R}{R}{R}.
trans-unit.target:
于提勃进战场时，你获得具有「你可以使用以CARDNAME放逐的牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放这类咒语的费用」的徽记。 +2：放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌。 −3：放逐目标神器或生物。 −8：放逐所有坟墓场中的所有牌。加{R}{R}{R}。
神 {1}{B}

trans-unit.target: 死触 炫威～{1}{B}：目标牌手从其牌库中搜寻一张牌，然后将其牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。（只能于此生物攻击过的回合中起动此异能，且每回合只能起动一次。）

trans-unit.source: The demons took no captives and claimed no spoils; they sought only to destroy.

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Choose 1, 2, or 3 at random. trans-unit.target: 「勇莽洛格纳在与铁口巨龙大战百日之后咽气于此。我们在他安息之处周围设立石碑以资纪念。」 ～卡纳说书人伊斯琴

trans-unit.source: "The Cosmos Serpent carved these tunnels, and his echo remains, a twisting aura of ferocity and boundless growth."\n—Haugar, Kannah wayfinder
trans-unit.target: 「这些隧道乃是由寰宇盘蛇辟就，因此带来的扭曲影响依旧回荡其间，引致万物迅猛成长永不停歇。」 ～卡纳引路人豪格

trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命 在每个结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得了4点或更多生命，则派出一个4/4白色，具飞行与警戒异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·374 | Valkyrie Harbinger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Where she flies, the Light of Starnheim shines.
trans-unit.target: 她翅翼所及，便是斯达海姆光芒耀威之地。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·375 | Surtland Elementalist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Giant card from your hand or pay {2}.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 从你手上展示一张巨人牌或支付{2}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以从你手上施放一张瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·376 | Cleaving Reaper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I won't pollute my blade with your blood, demon. You'll die by your own axe!"
trans-unit.target: 「恶魔，我不会让你的污血沾染我的宝剑；而会用你的利斧来取你性命！」

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, CARDNAME deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target. If the sacrificed creature was a Giant, CARDNAME deals twice that much damage instead.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。当你如此作时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量。若所牺牲的生物是巨人，则改为CARDNAME造成该数量两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·377 | Surtland Flinger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Victory before camaraderie.

trans-unit.target: 艾席嘉矮人平时不常需要离开自己坚不可摧的地底王国～当他们真有需要时，必会武装稳妥。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·380 | Starnheim Aspirant | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: Her fingers stiffened as the shrouded corpse stirred. Her final, ragged breath was one of triumph. "Return, my chosen, and grant our people victory!"
